Package balance_update_from_log

Class UserBalance

java.lang.Object
balance_update_from_log.UserBalance
All Implemented Interfaces:
BalanceObserver
public class UserBalance extends Object implements BalanceObserver
This class describes the balance of a user. It implements the interface BalanceObserver by observing when a trip is added in LogFinishedTrips.
